nodes.bodyText: Will need to be resolved with #1298.
I don't think this was ever used with AWS client, so this is prob unnecessary.
I'm not sure if this works... I think you need something like `[3.0,].  I could be wrong though.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,26 @@
+muzzle {
+  // There are lots of weird versions in this project like "20020423"
+  // Keep things simple with just 3.x
+  pass {
+    group = "commons-httpclient"
+    module = "commons-httpclient"
+    versions = "3.+"

nodes.bodyText: Unfortunate there isn't a direct way to do this.
